title: Enticing Eden: Mature Romance over 40
description: Eden is a good woman with a big heart and strong morals, but a Harley-riding, foul-mouthed, mature man covered in tattoos challenges her resolve.She knows what happens when you give in to sin, and she begs God to remove her biggest temptation ever, Carl Watson.Carl would not be considered a good man by many people's standards, but a Christian woman sees beyond his rough exterior, recognizing the good that he truly is.He knows that Eden is too good for him, and that makes her all the more appealing to him. She may be the key to his salvation.Mature Romance Over 40
author: Kimberly Smith
